articles.author: George Ramsay, Wayne Sterling
articles.title: Seattle Mariners take ALCS Game 1 with 3-1 road win over Toronto Blue Jays - CNN
articles.description: The Seattle Mariners took Game 1 of the American League Championship Series (ALCS) with a 3-1 road win over the Toronto Blue Jays.
articles.content:
The Seattle Mariners took Game 1 of the American League Championship Series (ALCS) with a 3-1 road win over the Toronto Blue Jays.
The Mariners trailed the Blue Jays in the sixth inning on Sunday be… [+1749 chars]
